Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have light colored patches on my face and forearms.
Have these patches changed in size or number over time?
No, they have not changed in size or number.
Do these patches itch or cause any irritation?
No, there is no itching or irritation.
Do you have any personal or family history of skin conditions or autoimmune diseases?
I have a history of well-controlled eczema.

No, there haven't been any changes in medication or exposure to new skincare products.

Yes, the patches on my cheeks and forearms are poorly defined and lighter in color.
Final Diagnosis: Vitiligo
